description:
Take one of the sides and lead your invasion on a single map. The object of the game is to have control of the most terrain tiles after all units have been placed. Each turn you can move/clone one warrior to a tile. If this tile is adjacent to any enemy tile, it will take control over them. A warrior can clone to any empty adjucent tile, or can move 1-2 tiles away.
 
 The end battle condition is determined if no more turns are possible, or the whole population of the opposite army is converted into your kind. The percentage of the conquered land will determine the winner.
 
 Features:
 - Single-Player with 2 levels of difficulty (Chieftain & Warlord)
 - Multi-Player on the same device/phone (choose Player 2 as your opponent)
 - Unlimited re-playability
 - Randomly generated maps
